title: P#t@s Redes Sociales
overview: Amanda, a children's content YouTuber on the decline, has just turned 30, making her an old woman on the Internet. Realizing she doesn't know how to do anything else, and that attention from strangers is the closest thing she has to love, she will go to great lengths to regain relevance on social media, no matter the cost, and taking down whoever is in her way.
